-- | Parser for Haskell-based configuration files.
--   
@package conf
@version 0.1.1.0

module Data.Conf.Parser
type Conf = [(String, String)]
parseConf :: String -> Conf

module Data.Conf
type Conf = [(String, String)]
readConf :: String -> IO [(String, String)]
getConf :: Read a => String -> Conf -> Maybe a
parseConf :: String -> Conf
